title: Person With Crown Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents royalty, power, leadership, or a sense of being special and celebrated. It can also be used playfully to indicate someone feeling like a king or queen.
apple_vendor_description: The person with crown emoji on Apple devices is a regal figure with a medium skin tone, adorned with an exquisitely detailed golden crown that catches the light with realistic shine. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges give the crown a noble and luxurious appearance. This emoji, with its confident gaze, often represents royalty, authority, excellence, or a feeling of being truly special and triumphant.
